derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: alteration (influenced by Latin albus 'white') of 16th-cent. alcatras, applied to various seabirds including the frigate bird and pelican, from Spanish and Portuguese alcatraz, from Arabic al-g̦aṭṭās 'the diver'

encyclopedia.content: 影片资料 中文名称：信天翁 英文名称：Albatross 导演： 尼亚尔·迈克考米克 （Niall MacCormick） 编剧： Tamzin Rafn （screenplay) 主演： 菲丽希缇·琼斯 Felicity Jones (Beth ) 杰西卡·布朗-芬德利 Jessica Brown-Findlay (Emelia ) 塞巴斯蒂安·考奇 Sebastian Koch (Jonathan ) 影片类型： 剧情 国家/地区： 英国 对白语言： 英语 色彩： 彩色 上映日期：英国 UK 2011年6月19日制作/发行 制作公司：CinemaNX Isle of Man

entry.def: An albatross is a very large white seabird.

entry.tran: 沉重的负担；无法摆脱的苦恼；障碍
entry.def: If you describe something or someone as an albatross around your neck, you mean that they cause you great problems from which you cannot escape, or they prevent you from doing what you want to do.

example.ex: Privatization could become a political albatross for the ruling party.
example.tran: 私有化可能会成为该执政党一个难以摆脱的政治障碍。

sentences.sentence: "she was an albatross around his neck"

means.word_mean: 2. large web-footed birds of the southern hemisphere having long narrow wings; noted for powerful gliding flight
